name: *Email Tenant - Lead Test Requirement
summary: Send this email to tenants to inform them of the incoming water sampling kit.
copyable-message:
Good [Morning/Afternoon],

I am emailing you to advise that you will shortly receive a sampling kit from PRN Water Services in the post. The purpose of this sampling kit is to collect water samples from your home, and then post them back to our laboratory so that we can test the water for lead contents.

Your letting agents, [Lettting Agent Name], have employed us to carry out the lead testing for their properties. Accordingly, please could you collect water samples by following the instruction manual found inside the kit and post them back to us using the included pre-paid returns label as soon as possible. A video guide on how to collect the samples can be viewed below:

https://youtu.be/S3yWIWTO8TQ

This testing is a one-off requirement and has been implemented as a result of the Scottish Government updating the Repairing Standard, where rental properties in Scotland built before 1970 now need their drinking water tested for traces of lead. You can find more information on the legislation by visiting our website:

https://www.prnwaterservices.com/the-legislation-information

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

We haven't yet received your water samples at our laboratory yet. Please reply to this email confirming when you expect to return them.

Best regards,

name: *Email Tenant - Didn't Receive Kit - Re-Sending Sampling Kit After Non-Receipt
summary: Send this email to tenants who need a new sampling kit.
copyable-message:
Hi [Tenant's Forename],

Sorry to hear that! The kit we sent must have went missing in the post.

We'll arrange to send a replacement sampling kit to your address shortly so we can proceed with testing your water system for lead. Once it's dispatched, you should receive a confirmation email from Royal Mail.

Please keep an eye out for a small blue rectangular cardboard box‚Äîit should arrive within a week.

 Once it arrives, just fill the empty bottles with water from the relevant taps in your property, pop them back in the box, and send the kit back to us using the included pre-paid returns label (stick the returns label over the label on top of the box).

Best regards,
